item.title: ConsultingPress Resolution for 2017 More Niche Themes
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
ConsultingPress Resolution for 2017 More Niche Themes

Many say niche themes are dead, or will be soon. The mega themes will rule the market. Although we agree to some point, we still believe in niche themes. Why? Because they serve a purpose, real purpose. ConsultingPress is for example suitable for consulting niche and it's a perfect choice for any consulting company. Why is ConsultingPress better choice than other bloated multi-use themes with 200+ layouts? Because you need simple, fast, SEO friendly and lightweight site, for starters. You need a theme that will give you enough flexibility and functionality to accomplish your needs, not three thousand options you will never use and that will make your site cluttered and slow. Another reason is that when you create a niche theme, you need to investigate the industry field in which you are entering with your theme. That means examining wide range of real companies, their websites, their needs and areas for improvements. What that means? When you buy a niche theme you can be sure that it is the best possible solution for your site. It's already SEO friendly, with real content, so you can actually read the content, not lorem lpsum. Of course, you will change that content, but you will see in real example what keywords are used, how many times, how images are named and why. You get a complete solution and you can set up your site with just a few clicks. The site built upon lightweight niche theme will be fast, optimized and have good ranking, which is very important.
item.excerpt:encoded: Many say niche themes are dead, or will be soon. The mega themes will rule the market.

item.title: Guidelines for a high-impact business strategy
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Guidelines for a high-impact business strategy

What make s a good business strategy. First of all you need to determine your company vision, that is the first step. You need to ask yourself where I want to be in two, three or five years. What are my business goals, how will I measure them and it's achievement. After you defined that, you can start the business strategy creation. So what is business strategy? It is set of actions that you will perform that will enable you to fulfill your company's vision. So it is a set of steps that will guide you to your final goal. So is there only one strategy? No, company can have a lot of strategies, but all of them must be in alignment of company's vision, after all it's the tool for vision achievement. So how can company strategy have high positive impact on your business? It can have if it is properly defined. With clear set of processes, functions, dedicated people and performance metrics, you will be able to monitor your company's position and statistics in any time. This will enable you to adjust to market fluctuations and challenges on time, with minimum risk and maximum results.
item.excerpt:encoded: What make s a good business strategy. First of all you need to determine your company vision, that is the first step.

item.title: Developing future logistics leaders in Europe
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Developing future logistics leaders in Europe

Trucking, transportation and logistics company from Germany is one of the most recognizable logistics companies in Central Europe. Although they have a great market share in Central Europe, they wanted to expand to whole Europe market. That's where ConsultingPress made it's contribution. Our industry experts created detailed market entry plan along with market analysis and global strategy creation. ConsultingPress investigated market potential and areas in which the market is not yet saturated and Trucking Ltd can compete and gain loyal customers. The project took eight months of preparation, analysis and planning. Trucking expanded to Spain, UK, Italy and Hungary, where they created new alliances and opened opportunity for even greater expansion, leaving the options for some mergers and acquisitions.
item.excerpt:encoded: Trucking, transportation and logistics company from Germany is one of the most recognizable logistics companies in Central Europe.

item.title: Increase company value by investing in people
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Increase company value by investing in people

What do you think, which is the greatest asset of every company? It's financial instruments, physical goods or something else? The greatest asset of every company are it's people, their knowledge expertise and potential. That is every company's greatest asset. Many companies struggle in this harsh competitive environment and can't seem to find a way to deal with rapid changes and global competition. They turn to investing in better marketing, but still there is no result. Why? They don't have enough people capacity to deliver promised goods for clients in desirable time, or their people don't have enough knowledge to complete the project on time. So what is the result of such situations? Loss of clients loyalty and loss of clients in general. But what about the solution? The solution is to invest in people, it's your most valuable asset. Right people make right decisions in right time! Weather you are a big or small company, your employees must be on your number one spot for investment. Learn, educate and grow their knowledge and expertise. It will help you gain more clients, greater loyalty and of course more satisfied people in your organization and desirable and enjoyable working environment. Of course this results in greater value for your company.
item.excerpt:encoded: The greates asset of every company are it's people, their knowledge expertise and potential.
